name: YESTERDAY'S LIFE
description:
Poetry is my therapy, it's my way of saying what I feel and think without having to come right out and say it. For me poetry is music without a beat, its raw, no interruptions. We all live a life with a mixture of emotions; a life with various experiences. Death, life, love, hate; it's all here in.....Yesterdays Life. 

YESTERDAY'S LIFE is a collection of 60 poems written by myself from 2002 to 2009
